When you wear these green-tinted glasses, all the movement in the surrounding area seems to jump out at you. You gain a +1 item bonus to your Perception DC against Stealth checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sneak], and anyone attempting to Sneak doesn't benefit from the circumstance bonus from cover against your Perception DC.
